error.title: Assignments not selected
error.message: You did not select an assignment for each module. Please make the selections and return to the review section.

competencies.text: Identify characteristics of a resilent organization or community.
Identify and describe a healthy business environment.
Identify role of government in society and consequences of public policy processes.
Identify role and impact of nonprofit organizations in society.
Assess community resources and opportunities to develop skills at the household level.
Evaluate urban infrastructure and environmental conditions.

competencies.communication: Identify tools, skills and procedures for negotiation and mediation in communities and organizations.

competencies.text: Apply strategies that guide selection of appropriate methods for identifying and answering questions.
competencies.communication: Demonstrate ability to interpret or report findings to multiple audiences.
Produce a policy brief about a community issue.

competencies.text: Judge best information sources and/or data to use for analyses.
competencies.communication: Research multiple perspectives of a public issue.

competencies.text: To Identify and describe multiple interdisciplinary approaches such as information literacy, numeracy, spatial thinking, and systems thinking.
Charactericize global economic technological and societal trends to develop policy responses.
Research multiple perspectives of a public issue.
Identify multiple perspectives of a public issue.
Demonstrate awareness of ethical issues embedded in public problems.

review_instructions: Please review your selected tasks. Click the print button to save your custom planner.

assignments.title: First Task
assignments.instructions: Burgdoggen ribeye picanha ham hock, pastrami strip steak shank shankle doner filet mignon pork. Jowl strip steak porchetta pastrami. Beef short ribs tenderloin turkey. Pancetta ham hock frankfurter pork pastrami.
